description: Lang configuration for different series types. For more dynamic control over the series element descriptions, see accessibility.seriesDescriptionFormatter.

children.name: description
children.description: User supplied description text. This is added in the point comment description by default if present.

children.name: nullPointValue
children.description: Description for the value of null points.

children.name: pointAnnotationsDescription
children.description: Description for annotations on a point, as it is made available to assistive technology.

children.name: summary
children.description:
Lang configuration for the series main summary. Each series type has two modes:

  1. This series type is the only series type used in the chart

  2. This is a combination chart with multiple series types

If a definition does not exist for the specific series type and mode, the 'default' lang definitions are used.

children.name: xAxisDescription
children.description: xAxis description for series if there are multiple xAxes in the chart.

children.name: yAxisDescription
children.description: yAxis description for series if there are multiple yAxes in the chart.
